channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) in IE Mode on Windows 10 Version 1803 for ARM64-based Systems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) in IE Mode on Windows 10 Version 1803 for ARM64-based Systems

item.title: CVE-2020-1220|2024-08-04T06:31:59.416Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20edge%20%28chromium-based%29%20in%20ie%20mode%20on%20windows%2010%20version%201803%20for%20arm64-based%20systems
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists when theMicrosoft Edge (Chromium-based) in IE Mode improperly handles specific redirects, aka 'Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) in IE Mode Spoofing Vulnerability'.
